resources.string: COGNIZANCE is the most awaited annual tech gala for every budding engineer in Charusat.\nCognizance is a prism , where college students find an array of events and activities to participate and get valuable recognition. This time cognizance 2k17 is coming up with more exuberant experience like never before.

Be it the enchanting guest lectures or learning hands-on skills through workshops, from exciting departmental activities and competitions to mesmerising techno-cultural nights, from discovering a new yourself in the crowd to becoming one united soul on the DJ eve, COGNIZANCE has it all.

And this time will be no different. With 40 events and participation of 10,000+ Â students from across different parts of the state , COGNIZANCE ensures that it is an unforgettable experience for every single one.\nSo,come aboard and rejoice every inch of it at the celebration where ideas as well as minds meet and compete.

Go to Events and check out all the events. From the Computer Geeks to Mechanical Muscle, from IT special to Electronic Robots, from Civil Structures to Electric Edison, we have all events any engineer would love to participate in. \nAlso checkout guest lecture to find the right path and inspire yourself and other NonTech Events.
